name: Folio 2020 • Product Design Portfolio Template
description:
A deck for putting together your product design portfolio quickly. Whether you're a new designer or a seasoned pro—folio helps your whole self come to light while displaying your best work. 


Benefits

Guided layout – to help you curate your projects, process and outcomes

Launch fast — skip the never ending process of perfecting your portfolio site

Customize — adjust your portfolio for different roles with little effort


Folio is for

Product Designers - take your viewers behind the scenes, reveal the magic of your process, highlight key decisions that influenced your final design.

UX Researchers - untangle the problem, show the pain-staking diligence in your methodology and close strong with metrics and findings.

New & Seasoned Pros - putting your portfolio together for the first time? Done it before? This template takes care of tedious layout decisions helping you focus on highlighting your best work.
